name: I do want to get another car later this year, but have been waiting for an EV that suits me. If I had to buy today, I would probably get an Audi e-Tron GT. I so wish Alfa Romeo had an electric Giulia!

content.html: I do want to get another car later this year, but have been waiting for an EV that suits me. If I had to buy today, I would probably get an Audi e-Tron GT. I so wish Alfa Romeo had an electric Giulia!
content.value: I do want to get another car later this year, but have been waiting for an EV that suits me. If I had to buy today, I would probably get an Audi e-Tron GT. I so wish Alfa Romeo had an electric Giulia!

summary: @jonathan I also want a BEV car, as opposed to a crossover/SUV/truck, but it looks like all the manufacturers are not bringing them to the US because they cannot compete with the Chinese brands like BYD so they just...ceded that portion of the market despite them not being sold here (yet, if ever).
